    Class
    Description
    class 
    Armory
    Armory is a type of Target Armory occupies 3 cells in length and 2 cells in width in base
    class 
    Barrack
    Barrack is a type of Target Barrack occupies 3 cells in length and 1 cells in width in base

    Ground is a type of Target Ground denotes the absence of Target within the base

    HeadQuarter is a type of Target HeadQuarter occupies 6 consecutive cells in base
